question: Who among the following were the close associates of Gandhiji?
option2: Mira Behn, J.P. Narayan, Lord Mountbatten, Manibhai Desai
option4: Sarla Behn, J. B. Kripalani, Mira Behn
answer: Sarla Behn, J. B. Kripalani, Mira Behn
explanation:
Sarala Behn was an English Gandhian social activist whose work in the Kumaon region of Uttrakhand. Mirabehn was a British woman who left her home in Britain to live and work with Mohandas Gandhi.
Kripalani was a Gandhian socialist, environmentalist, mystic and independence activist.
